title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Community Innovation Survey)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Community Innovation Survey) 

Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (community innovation survey) order 2025

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: 2. (1) In this Order –
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order – 

“Regulation” means Regulation (EU) 2019/2152 of the European Parliament and 
of the Council of 27 November 20191, as amended by Commission Delegated 
Regulation (EU) 2021/1704 of 14 July 20212; 

“survey” means the Community Innovation Survey that is conducted by the 
Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining, including for the purposes 
of compliance with the Regulation, information set out in the Schedule. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, except 
where the context otherwise requires.
text_norm: 2 (1) order - regulation mean regulation (eu) 2019 2152 european parliament council 27 november 20191 amended commission delegated regulation (eu) 2021 1704 14 july 20212 survey mean community innovation survey conducted central statistic office purpose obtaining including purpose compliance regulation information set schedule (2) word expression used order also used regulation meaning order regulation except context otherwise requires

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: 3. This Order applies to an undertaking that –
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to an undertaking that – 

(a) 

(b) 

engages 10 or more persons, and 

is classified for statistical purposes under class 03.30 of section 
A, section B, C, D, E, G, H, J, K, L or N or class 91.30 of section 
S of NACE Rev. 2.1, as set out in Annex I to Regulation (EC) No. 
1893/2006 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 20 
December 20063, as amended by Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 
of the European Parliament and of the Council of 11 March 20084, 
Regulation (EU) No. 70/2012 of the European Parliament and of 
the Council of 18 January 20125, Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of 
the European Parliament and of the Council of 20 June 20196 and

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: 4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide,
text_raw:
4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide, 
once only and for the purposes of the survey, information the general nature of 
which is specified in the Schedule is hereby prescribed. 

7 OJ No. L 19, 20.1.2023, p. 5 

 
 
 
 
 4 [209]

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: Information in relation to the years 2022 to 2024 regarding the following,
text_norm: 1 information relation year 2022 2024 regarding following relates undertaking concerned (a) general information business activity (b) product (good service) innovation (c) process innovation (d) ongoing abandoned innovation activity product process innovation (e) (f) (g) (h) business finance innovation activity expenditure tax incentive product process innovation co-operation product process innovation factor hampering innovation activity intellectual property right (i) turnover employment (j) corporate responsibility sustainability (k) climate change (l) innovation environmental benefit (m) non-innovators
